data.author: Caller

changelog.release_notes: Don't animate constantly if walking / hammering / vigorously shaking hand.

data.description:
Happy Chinese New Year! 新年快乐! (Xin Nian Kuai Le)

Chinese characters for month and date: month + 月(yue) + day + 日(ri). The month and date are numbers written as below.
Time uses Arabic numerals except that the characters for o'clock (点 dian) and half past (点半 dian ban) are shown.
Weekday at the bottom. In Chinese the days of the week are: "星期一 = xing qi yi = weekday 1 = Monday", "星期二 = xing qi er = weekday 2 = Tuesday"..... "星期六 = xing qi liu = weekday 6 = Saturday". Sunday is special (星期天 xing qi tian).

The Zodiac animal for the Chinese Lunar Year is displayed as your year's mascot. Until Feb 8 2015 it is year of the goat, but soon the monkey will take over.
My town is full of red lanterns hanging from trees for Chinese New Year and it looks beautiful, so there's a lantern in the watch face.

Low battery: background turns orange.
Background goes black and short vibration when phone disconnects.
Flick your wrist: the character for luck (fu 福) flashes on (upside down as per tradition) to bring you good fortune in the new year. It totally works.

Year of the Monkey will be added to your Timeline!!

Enjoy. Any suggestions appreciated. I speak a bit of Mandarin but I'm not actually Chinese so hopefully I've not made mistakes or done something massively insensitive.

https://paypal.me/caller

Quick intro to Chinese numbers with Mandarin pronunciation (for the date and weekday):
1 yi 一
2 er 二
3 san 三
4 si 四
5 wu 五
6 liu 六
7 qi 七
8 ba 八
9 jiu 九
10 shi 十
11 shi yi 十一
12 shi er 十二
29 er shi jiu 二十九

latest_release.release_notes: Don't animate constantly if walking / hammering / vigorously shaking hand.

data.title: Chinese New Year of the Monkey

Une watchface en hommage aux pompiers de France et d'ailleurs représentant le casque des pompiers français.
La barre de soulignement du mot "PompierS" indique le niveau de charge de la batterie de la montre. Un petit 18 (numéro d'appel des pompiers français) s'affiche lorsque la connexion bluetooth est établie.

data.description:
Pebble Clone of my old CASIO AE-11W watch.
Shows Time in analog and digital, date and weather. Automatic switching or through shaking. Shows Battery level, charge and BT Status on the outer hour points.
Fully configurable: inverter, auto mode, hourly and BT loss vibration, seconds update interval, date format and city code for weather.

data.description:
Simple Undertale-themed watchface with 10+ different backgrounds that change every few hours. Some time slots have fixed events, while others are randomly chosen from a group (some rarer than others). Upon Bluetooth disconnect, the time digits will turn red. 

If there is enough interest, I plan to add some animations and additional backgrounds (more random events + unpleasant encounters for those who stay up too late...).

Inspired by (and all assets taken from) tobyfox's Undertale. Grab the free demo and try it out! 

This watchface contains spoilers.

latest_release.release_notes: Version 2.0: Adds aplite compatibility for the OG Pebbles! Need to eventually create bt disconnect that doesn't rely on color.

data.title: Undertale Life

data.author: Adam Gyte

changelog.release_notes:
AUSTRALIAN TIMEZONES
by Adam Gyte

Features: 
* A simple watchface that shows the five timezones of Australia, along with Zulu (GMT) time.
* Automatically adjusts for daylight savings at 2am on the first Sunday of April and October for each applicable state.

Limitations:

* The watchface has small, hard to read text due to fitting it inside the state boundaries.
* Victoria, Tasmainia and the Australian Capital Territory use the time displayed in New South Wales.
* Only displays 24 hour time format regardless of pebble setting
* Not available for Pebble Chalk

data.description:
AUSTRALIAN TIMEZONES
by Adam Gyte

Features: 
* A simple watchface that shows the five timezones of Australia, along with Zulu (GMT) time.
* Automatically adjusts for daylight savings at 2am on the first Sunday of April and October for each applicable state.

Limitations:

* The watchface has small, hard to read text due to fitting it inside the state boundaries. I do apologise!
* Victoria, Tasmainia and the Australian Capital Territory use the time displayed in New South Wales.
* Only displays 24 hour time format regardless of pebble setting
* Not available for Pebble Chalk (yet)

data.author: Oscar Tapia

changelog.release_notes: First release

data.description:
Features: 
Calendar shows current week plus the next 3 weeks.
Julian date is displayed above the calendar in green (J24).
weather conditions are displayed in a minimalist layout.
battery is displayed by a dot on the top right corner based on the battery level as follows:
100%-50% - Green
50%-20% - Yellow
<20% - Red

Workaholic is the watchface I use everyday for work because it relays to me all the information I need at a glance.  It is by no way meant to be a nice looking watchface but rather a productive one.
 
(slightly inspired by @cynorg's Timely watchface)
data.title: Workaholic

data.description:
An very detailed weather access on your wrist, with an original way of telling the time.

Battery efficient (Pebble gave the A-grade rating) and a tons of customisation !

Automatic 12/24h, 4 langages supported.

Big thanks to everybody that helped improving this watchface (Thomas and Derek in perticular)

Asian weather icons made kindly by Dr Giuseppe Insana for this watchface. (MediaGlyphs Project www.mediaglyphs.org)
Rounded icon idea is from by Din Time, thank you Christian for your great watchface !

Android users: If you have trouble seeing the phone battery on your watchface, just download the companion on the play store ! (ruler weather companion)
data.title: Ruler Weather

data.author: Nicolas El Mir
data.description:
Tweetic is a Twitter clock based on alltheminutes.com. At any moment of the day, Tweetic let's you know the current time and what people are up to. With a simple shake, you get another random tweet to inspire your moment .

Developed by @nicolas_elmir @conversionpoint

Night release 1.0
data.title: Tweetic

data.author: Christophe Jeannette

changelog.release_notes: Removed UTC from settings
Better temperature accuracy
bug fix on some rare icons
Removed padding from 12h hour representation.
bugfix

- A lot of changes in the code, it is will be even more battery efficient. 
- The weather in now saved into the pebble memory so the forecast will be triggered only when needed. 
- Added a bluetooth disconnection indicator 
- Added a second screen with date and battery
- The 0 should not appear before the hour now
30mn/60mn weather refresh added
metric option : wind is now in kmh instead of ms

Major update: - The temperature are now very precise thanks to the UTC time in the options - Better bluetooth integration - Huge work on the code. (The app now takes approximately 10 times less space in the memory) - Now its beautiful on OG pebble !  - Various bug fixes

data.description:
This is Time Graph Weather, a representation of the next 12 hours of weather forecast at a glance.

The rain is represented with the vertical lines, one raw in 1mm of expected precipitations.
The temperature line is red or blue depending on the water-freezing temperature. 

Options: 
GPS On/Off
Fixed Position
Metric/Imperial
Two sets of 16 icons

Hourly vibrations
White icons set

Major update:
- The temperature are now very precise thanks to the UTC time in the options
- Better bluetooth integration
- Huge work on the code. (The app now takes approximately 10 times less space in the memory)
- Colors !
- Now beautiful on OG pebble 
- Various bug fixes
data.title: Time Graph Weather

data.author: dP-watchfaces

changelog.release_notes: 3.14 settings page host changed
3.13 Fix issue with OpenWeather key.

3.12
+ Bug fixed and improved ambient light detection.

3.11
+ Recompile for last Pebble firmware
+ Improve low ambient light detection
+ Improved style 18, bug fixed in styles 9, 20 for Pebble Round
+ New styles (22, 23)

3.10
+ New number 7: Health-Kcalories burned.
+ 3 New styles! (styles 19..21).
+ New feature: Night color (used for night or low ambient light)
+ Several styles refined.
+ Improvements.

3.00
+ New number 5: Health distance walked today
+ New number 6: Health step counts today
+ 8 New styles! (11..18)
+ Improvements

2.00
+ 3 New styles!(8, 9 and 10): D4123C, 4D1C32, D4-12-C3.
+ New choice: Use highlight color for minutes instead of hour.
+ Pebble Original compatible
+ New choice: Disable weather (requested by some users), for now the rest of information not rearranged.
+ Solved the mystery of Numbers and Letters: 1:Hour, 2:Minutes, 3:Day, 4:Temperature, A:Bluetooth/Battery-status, B:Month-of-year, C:Day-of-week, D:Weather-condition
+ On next release 3.0... a new Number, 5:Health-steps-count.

data.description:
NUMBLET, numbers and letters.
---
+ LOOK STYLE: 23 different watch face styles composed by Numblets.
Numblets: 1:Hour, 2:Minutes, 3:Day, 4:WeatherTemperature, 5:DistanceWalked, 6:StepCount, 7:KCaloriesBurned, A:Bluetooth/BatteryStatus, B:MonthOfYear, C:DayOfWeek, D:WeatherCondition

+ HIGHLIGHT COLOR: 10 different highlight colors
+ NIGHT COLOR: Choose alternative color used at night or when low ambient light.

+ WEATHER COLOR: weather temperature and/or weather condition colored.
(look at last screenshot animation to learn the weather color coding)

+ HIGHLIGHT MINUTES instead of HOUR: Yes / No
 
+ BLUETOOTH STATUS INDICATOR: C/D connected/disconnected. Shown always or when disconnected only (depending on LOOK STYLE).
+ BATTERY CHARGE INDICATOR: 0..9 (0%..90%), F(Full 100%). Shown always or when charge below 20% only (depending on LOOK STYLE).

+ VIBES ON DISCONNECT/RECONNECT: Yes / No
+ WEATHER UNITS: Temperature in Celsius or Fahrenheit.
+ DISTANCE UNITS: Walked distance in Kilometers or Miles
+ WEATHER LOCATION (Blank for auto detection, ZipCode,CountryCode for manual location)

+ TIME FORMAT (12, 24) (Detected from Pebble watch settings)
+ LANGUAGES (English, Spanish) (detected from Pebble)

+ WEATHER CONDITION LEGEND:
  -(english) SUN:Sunny, CLR:Clear, PCL:Partly-Cloud, CDS:Clouds, RAI:Rain, THN:Thunderstorm, SNW:Snow, FOG:Fog
  -(spanish) SOL:Soleado, CLR:Claro, PNU:Parcialmente-Nublado, NUB:Nublado, LLU:Lluvia, TOR:Tormenta, NVE:Nieve, NBL:Niebla
  (some LOOK STYLEs use 2-letter only)
data.title: Numblet

data.description:
Sitting in boring meetings, a train or on a long trip with a bus you can watch the scenario of a deep blue see alias fish tank. 

The "actors" change a little all over the day. Due to this it remains interesting. The lead is assigned to a big white shark. ;) Also the current weather for a fix selected or per GPS detected location is shown in addition to the current date in nearly any language. 

An intelligent algorithm controls the activity to take the charging level of the battery into account.

latest_release.release_notes:
* emery support
* better battery management through more acceleration evaluation
* add quite time evaluation 
* added tap event 
* small bugfixes and improvement

data.title: FishTank

data.description:
A big and clear watchface to keep you and your friends up-to-date with real-time financial indexes. 

The following indexes are currently supported:
1. HSI (Hang Seng Index)
2. HSCEI (Hang Seng China Enterprises Index)
3. Nikkei (Nikkei 225)
4. IXIC (NASDAQ Composite)
5. S&P 500 (Standard & Poor's 500)
6. FTSE (Financial Times Stock Exchange 100 Index)
7. DAX (Deutscher Aktienindex)
8. CAC 40 (French stock market index)

data.author: jpoles1

changelog.release_notes: Fixed bug that prevented showing only weather.
Fixed up spacing on Pebble Time Round.
Added international weather support!

Lots of fixes: 
- Fixed a weather glitch thanks a report from a user.
- Fixed theme change errors
- Stability patches
Added support for Aplite and Chalk! Report any problems to jpoles1@gmail.com
Added weather reports and bluetooth disconnect notifications to the watchface.

Color changing is well implemented. 
I think I've squashed a lot of the bugs; if you find something, send the developer an email.
There is one persistent bug I have not fixed: two parts of the user interface will not change color immediately (namely the battery %). Opening and closing the app menu fixes this issue.

I've also included themes in the configuration! Send me an email if you think you've found a good theme that should be added!
Added the ability to customize the watch colors!
Fixed a spelling issue per user request.

data.description:
Inspired by the awesome watchfaces PokeBattle and PokeBattle Color, PokeBattleRound is fully redesigned to support Pebble Time Round!

Due to popular demand, Pebble Time is now supported as well!

Watchface requested by /u/Charzardborn.

- 30 Pokémons currently
- A new battle starts every hour
- Enemy HP bar represents remaining minutes for current hour
- Ally HP bar represents battery level
- Date at top of screen

Don't forget to share the ❤!

Thanks to:
@derfreimann and @Nannoises for the base code
@Peregrinestar for UI inspiration
@pokemondb.net for poké sprites

This watchface represents a non-profit fan-made work as a tribute for Pokémon. I do not claim ownership of anything related to Pokémon. Pokémon is owned by Nintendo and they have all the rights for it.

latest_release.release_notes:
v1.3
- Fixed (for good) a bug where Pokémons refused to fight after a couple of hours

data.description:
Now with steps.

HC (High Contrast) Weather Analog is meant to be readable in low light condition, yet keeping an elegant overlook.

Weather is updated once every 30mn.
This is the imperial version, wind is in miles/hours, temperature in Fahrenheit. 

This watchface automatically change the date langage for :
- English
- French
- Spanish
- German

A second screen allow the user to access more weather content :
- Temperature
- Description
- Detailed description
- Wind speed
- Clouds
- Humidity
data.title: HC Weather Imperial

data.author: Michael D. Adams
data.description:
Subtilis is a watchface with a subtle elegance and simplicity.

Power usage is minimal even though it updates with ticks every second.  Screen updates involve only two scan lines per second.

It's large fonts are easy to read at a glance or from across the room.

Finally, it shows the full date (including the day of the week) and the percentage current battery charge along the bottom.
data.title: Subtilis

data.author: willwoz

changelog.release_notes:
I've added a new batter saver mode for those whole love counting the seconds. I though about using the quiet time settings for this but decided it made more sense to have independent settings. It basically disables the second hard (or display) when your asleep, turns off the hourly shake during that time. It helps a lot for us time round users.

Also added a proper colour picker, if anyone actually wants it I'll add a background one as well.
Just a quick cleanup now that I have my watch back. Getting ready for the new watch two.

Fixed battery issues introduced with digital face. And finally added other count formats, now counts in days, months and years. Just for those people who need to count things in days, months and years of course.
Small update to remove digital display lag and to add 12/24hr display. Hey I'm an analogue guy who knew there was a 24hr mode ;)

Dayface has gone digital. This was another request, which despite what I though, I actually kinda like. You can have a choice of Analogue Face, Digital Face or both. I also added some colour options and turned back on Aplite (black and white) support. Enjoy
Another small update with a new clean look option, see the config page.
Just the beginning of a new release. Someone asked for an hourly reminder so I released the cleaned up code with the reminder. More to come in the fullness of time.
Fixed: settings pointing to an old config page
Battery warning at 10% even if its turned off - good idea

This version adds simple weather and location information. It also fixed some readability problems with the face.

Fixed: Disappearing information after face changes and notifications.

data.description:
Simple, clean watch face that now has hands and digits, and counts days up or down, for anyone who needs to count days up or down.  Configurable battery and connection alert, and background and simple weather and location information.

I mainly wrote this for myself. Feel free to comment/suggest extra features.

latest_release.release_notes:
I've added a new batter saver mode for those whole love counting the seconds. I though about using the quiet time settings for this but decided it made more sense to have independent settings. It basically disables the second hard (or display) when your asleep, turns off the hourly shake during that time. It helps a lot for us time round users.

Also added a proper colour picker, if anyone actually wants it I'll add a background one as well.

data.title: DayFace

data.author: Fine Faces

changelog.release_notes: 1.1 - Noticed that it doesn't always clear the hourly message when the snake starts moving again.  Fixed that.

Version 1.0:

The snake starts each hour at minimum length.  Every minute throughout the hour he eats a fruit, or whatever it is he eats.  By the end of the hour he's massive!

Then he goes onto the next level and he's tiny again.

data.description:
Finally, a 100% accurate and fully lifelike vivarium-on-your-wrist!

This little snake eats a food pellet every minute, on the minute - increasing his score by one each time.  When he's got 60 points, he moves onto the next level - just like a real snake!  Of course, every time he eats food, he grows a bit - by the end of each hour he's massive!

When your battery is low, he forces himself to eat batteries instead of food to subtly let you know what's up.  No Bluetooth connection?  No problem - Mr Snake will gobble down Bluetooth symbols so you're never knowingly disconnected!

He's the best friend you never knew you needed - and you can modify his colours without him even blinking.  How could he - he hasn't even got any eyes!

latest_release.release_notes: 1.1 - Noticed that it doesn't always clear the hourly message when the snake starts moving again.  Fixed that.

data.description:
"I think that might be the most boring feature yet proposed." - Katharine

"@glacierglacier: This is the best thing." - Katharine

Meet Katharine - our benevolent slack leader/dev tools lead. One night, it was decided that her profound sayings should be recorded. This led to the creation of the kattracker (http://thomasstoeckert.github.io/kattrack), a site that gave all who could read the knowledge of our leader.

Now you can carry her sacred knowledge on your wrist - fetching new quotes every half hour. It can be displayed in 6 colorful themes.

data.description:
CSTM countdown is a watchface where you can set a custom countdown date. The watchface shows the current time in the top right corner. Below that, the countdown is listed. 

You can set the date (day and month) and a label (max 6 chars) for the countdown timer. If you don't put in any settings, it defaults to January first (counting down to NYE).  

The countdown will show days, hours and minutes left. As soon as there’s less than a day left, it’ll switch to hours, minutes and seconds. On the day itself, it will tell you to make the day count. The next day, the watchface will automatically start counting down to the same day the next year. 

The watchface is optimized for square screens, but does work on a pebble round (the view changes to centered text).

latest_release.release_notes: Changed URL for custom watchface settings from dev.edriessen.nl to app.edriessen.com.

data.description:
-=Styles=-

Features;
Smart sleep - After 30 minutes of inactivity, the app will enter a sleep mode, the screen will look like it's asleep. No app code will be running, and a simple shake will wake it up.

Stopwatch - (hr:min:sec) simply shake the watch (same amount to turn on the light) and  have your arm aiming up (left arm wearing).
A vibration will alert you. Do the gesture again to disable (3 short vibrations).

Custom text - Use the configuration screen to enter two rows of text or leave it blank for detailed weather readout.

Weather and conditions - 1 hr updates (except in sleep mode). configurable settings.

Full color support - (Foreground, background, and text) 3 colors for original pebble and 64 for color watches.

latest_release.release_notes: pebble 2 support - relative weather updates based on app start for API issues

data.title: Styles

changelog.release_notes: Add config option for desaturation on Bluetooth disconnect
enjoy

data.description: I love TomHol's Happy. This is a rip off which is configurable. You can change the colours, vibrate on Bluetooth disconnect, show date and weather, change font. Send me any suggestions I can add in. Spins on the minute if battery is OK. If low on juice it spins on the hour. Spins when tapped. The number of rays decreases as the battery level decreases. Source is on Github.

latest_release.release_notes: Add config option for desaturation on Bluetooth disconnect

data.author: Vyacheslav
data.description:
Digital clock with day of week, day of month, Bluetooth, status charging, 24 or 12 hours.

Specially drawn figures for the Pebble display are used. What provides equal and correct display.

data.description:
This is inspired by the Apple watchface X-Large. It shows only the time, no date, weather or anything else!!!
You can choose between 18 different colors for background and digits.

No further updates or support... I've sold my Pebble! Sorry.
data.title: X-Large

data.author: Daniel Cerezo

changelog.release_notes: 1.0 Initial release

data.description:
This is a modern WatchFace that includes: - The hour using the orange diamond. - Minutes that are represented by the Orange line (of course). - Day of the month thats inside the circle on the right side. - If you lost connection with your phone, the green circle will become red. The number inside the circle on the top is the current temperature. 

As always this is a free WatchFace. Please enjoy! :P

If you want to donate feel free to click on website link :) Thanks!!
